name: Extreme Gardening
description:
Keep your garden alive while fending of locusts and watering your plants before they perish. Will you keep your garden alive and become the ultimate extreme gardener?

instructions:

Your goal is to keep all of the plants in the garden

alive. left click on the watering can and swatter

to pick them up and right click to put them back.

Left click the plants with the watering can when a

water droplet appears above them. Left click on

locusts with the swatter to destroy them. Left

click the apple in time to get extra health for the

plants. You can not water plants during a locust swarm.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46: Keep it Alive
